content.rendered:
[vc_row visibility=”hidden-nb”][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_size=”” sub_lead=”yes” sub_reduced=”yes” uncode_shortcode_id=”112942″ subheading=”Empty legs flights charters”]Private Jet Empty Leg Flights[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text uncode_shortcode_id=”118514″]An empty leg, also called a ferry flight or an empty flight, is a private jet flying without any passengers. This happens when an aircraft drops off passengers at their destination and returns home “empty”, or when it flies “empty” to pick up passengers at another airport. It is perfect for short-notice trips and usually, it has great value.
Wanna see more flights? Download our app on your mobile and start travelling! [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image media=”106953″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”111174″ media_link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fappsto.re%2Fde%2FshjEgb.i|target:_blank”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
